name: Skwire
description: Skwire is tech-first real estate. We use AI to process millions of data points and identify the best-performing properties across the country. We combine these insights with IoT devices to create fully automated homes that anyone can rent.

team.title: Senior Software Developer
team.name: Pawel Barcik
team.bioHtml: Experienced Software Engineer with a broad hands-on expertise in Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Python, Scalable Service Oriented Architectures and DevOps.

team.title: Lead Developer
team.name: Anna Engel
team.bioHtml: An angel in the house, they say, will guard your family night & day.

jobs.title: Head of Asset Management / Operations
jobs.description:
Skwire is tech-first real estate investment. We use AI to process millions of data points and spot nuanced market trends to identify the best-performing residential assets. We combine these insights with IoT-enabled operations to create a better rental experience for tenants and scalable, hands-off investment products for institutional investors.

We’re a team of fourteen with backgrounds in data science, property investment, development, scaling and eight previous startups between us. We launched our first proof-of-concept portfolio in 2019, and use its excellent track record in our current raise for a £100m PRS fund. 

To deploy this capital quickly we need an experienced Head of Asset Management / Operations to help us create high-yield properties tenanted with happy renters across the UK.

Your duties
-	Manage track and improve our refurbishment, furnishing, property management processes and teams
-	Manage our deployment roll out into 6 UK regions starting in the South with teams of buyers, refurb managers and property managers
-	Join the C suite in fundraising meetings with larger institutions

Your profile
-	5+ years experience in residential operations at scale, ideally with a blue-chip UK RE company
-	Experience throughout the full residential value chain: refurbishment/development project management, supplier management / procurement, logistics, process management, property management
-	Creative problem solving to come up with better ways to do things and strong analytics to measure whether they really are better
-	Strong negotiation skills to secure the best terms for us, from kitchen suppliers to letting agents
-	Interest in Proptech, tech innovations and their implications for the industry
-	You take ownership of & responsibility for your work

What we offer
-	Market-rate compensation, share options subject to performance
-	Entrepreneurial working environment with remote work, flexible hours, no holiday cap
-	Management responsibilities for a fast-growing team
-	Experience how tech disrupts your industry, from AI sourcing to IoT enabled remote management

Examples of what you’ll encounter:
-	Find the best way to furnish properties according to tenants’ choice - third party, inhouse or a mix of both. 
-	What can we do to speed up the refurb process, without paying over the odds?
-	How short can we go on the notice period to create maximum tenant flexibility?

You will be working closely with and reporting directly to the CEO and have the support of our Operations & Property Managers. The nature of this role will expose you to all aspects of life in a proptech startup as well as require you to liaise with all teams. 

If you like what you see, please send your CV, an answer to two of the example problems above and a cover email to elisabeth@skwire.co.uk. Please include your desired start date, salary and motivation to work with us.

Skwire is tech-first real estate investment. We use AI to process millions of data points and spot nuanced market trends to identify the best-performing residential assets.
